join.joinCondition: fccs.person_id = p2.person_id AND (p2.voided is NULL || p2.voided = 0)

fccs.person_id = p5.person_id AND (p5.voided is NULL || p5.voided = 0)

expressionOptions.expression: CONCAT(COALESCE(p2.given_name, ''), ' ', COALESCE(p2.middle_name, ''), ' ', COALESCE(p2.family_name, ''))

CASE WHEN prior_via_done = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN prior_via_done = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE NULL END
CASE WHEN prior_via_result = 1 THEN 'Positive' WHEN prior_via_result = 2 THEN 'Negative' ELSE NULL END

columns.column: (select DATE_FORMAT(gynp_date_patient_informed_and_referred, '%d-%M-%Y') from etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening where encounter_type = 147 and (select gynp_date_patient_informed_and_referred from etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening where encounter_type = 147 and person_id = p2.person_id order by encounter_datetime desc limit 1) > (select encounter_datetime from etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening where encounter_type = 69 and person_id = p2.person_id order by encounter_datetime desc limit 1) and person_id = p2.person_id order by encounter_datetime desc limit 1)

expressionOptions.expression: (SELECT CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, DATE(encounter_datetime), (SELECT gynp_date_patient_informed_and_referred FROM etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening WHERE encounter_type = 147 AND person_id = p2.person_id ORDER BY encounter_datetime DESC LIMIT 1)), ' day(s)') FROM etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening WHERE person_id = p2.person_id AND encounter_type = 69 and (select gynp_date_patient_informed_and_referred from etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening where encounter_type = 147 and person_id = p2.person_id order by encounter_datetime desc limit 1) > (select encounter_datetime from etl.flat_cervical_cancer_screening where encounter_type = 69 and person_id = p2.person_id order by encounter_datetime desc limit 1) ORDER BY encounter_datetime DESC LIMIT 1)
